tr4: Whether it is a job in agriculture, or an engineer position the Jobp.eu/Munkaportal.ro offers you the opportunity to promote your openings in Transylvania Romania.
tr5: We use our social media channels so your job openings reach your target audience. If needed, we also plan and carry out the online recruitment campaign. You only need to focus on hiring the candidate.
